attributes.action: PETITION FOR THE SANCTIONING AND RETURN OF LEGAL BARE KNUCKLE BOXING WITHIN THE UK
attributes.additional_details:
THIS PETITION, IN SHORT, IS A COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT AMONGST THE HIGHEST INDEPENDANT SCHOLARS, EXPERTS, PARTICIPANTS, MEDICAL AUTHORITIES, AND THE GOOD WILL OF THE PUBLIC WHO PRESENT TO THIS COURT 100,000 SIGNATURES IN FAVOUR OF BARE KNUCKLE BOXING BEING GRANTED AN AUDIENCE OF DISMISSAL OR OUT RIGHT LEGALISATION AMONG THE HOUSE OF COMMONS.... BAREKNUCKLE BOXING HAS BEEN PROVEN TO BE SAFER THAN GLOVED BOXING AND THEREFORE THE PEOPLE WOULD FAVOUR ITS RETURN AS A RECOGNISED AND SAFE SPORT, AND TO CONVINCE THIS GOVERNMENT THE BENEFITS AND STATISTICS THAT PROVE BKB IS SAFE AND CONTRIVED OF SOUND MEMBERS.
..
